message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair given our differing inflation rates. Let's see if we can reach an agreement quickly.
Bob, this is already getting tedious.  I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 your way is too much. How about 55/45?
